revised_title: Sir Joseph Banks: A Comprehensive Biography and His Global Impact
tldr: This book review discusses a comprehensive biography of Sir Joseph Banks, a prominent figure in 18th-century science and technology. The book explores Banks' diverse activities, global connections, and influence on various scientific fields. It also highlights his role as a key figure in the transition from early 18th-century virtuosity to 19th-century science. However, the review notes that the book does not delve deeply into Banks' private life or political convictions.
